name: AeroCar2000
description:
Welcome to "AeroCar2000"!
an endless running game, that's let you take a part in the first sky ride test of AeroCar2000, a flying car, that manufactured in the early the 2000s.

Getting To Know The Real AeroCar2000 >>
The Aerocar 2000 was a proposed flying car under development in the early 2000s in the United States. The Aerocar 2000 was designed by Ed Sweeney, who was inspired by Moulton Taylor's Aerocar of the 1950s . The Aerocar 2000 consisted of a removable wings, tail, and powerplant "flight module".

A bit about the game>>
AeroCar2000 it's and endless runner game, based on the well- known mechanism of "Flappy Bird". The design was inspired by Y2K style with a modern touch.
 the game was created as part of "Art & Interaction" course, in the department of Visual Communication, Bezalel.

Good Luck, enjoy your sky ride!
